DocConstant.Name: NON_PHYSICAL_SIGNAL
DocConstant.Documentation: A virtual or fictitious signal. As opposed to the physical signal, the non-physical signal does not need to send information to the train. E.g. a fictitious signal on the signalman's display needed to define the route exit towards open line where there's no real signal. A virtual ERTMS L2 signal is also a non-physical signal but can have a physical presence, i.e. a stop marker board along the track.
